title: GMTK Game Jam
description: Building a retro style, object scaling, platforming, puzzle game for the game jam in Unity, in 3 days

title: Skills Ontario Competition
description: Representing George Brown College to program a .NET CLI application under 6 hours for the skill Ontario competition, achieving 4th place overall. (Provincial Programming scope).

title: FIRST Robotic Competition
(mentoring)
description: Advising over the electrical and programming side for the FIRST Robotic team CyberSquad 6977.

title: Hack For Good
description: Developed an Agri-tech solution prototype, ultimately winning the 1st prize in the hackathon.

title: Skills Ontario Competition
description: Competed in the electrical engineering scope. Regional gold medalist and 4th in the provincial competition.

title: FIRST Robotic Competition
description: Working collaboratively to build and program a robot for the team CyberSquad 6977 to competition in the FIRST Robotic Competition. Handled the electrical and programming group.

title: Cambodia CS Cup
description: Solving competitive programming problems for the competition, achiving top 20th as an only high school student

title: Impressive Community
description: Design advertising materials including posters, banners, and illustrations, to effectively promote Hi-GOAL Camp, an annual educational event to prepare high school graduate for post-secondary education.

title: Ellipse Bot
description: Form the team with a group of friends to spread interest in innovation and STEM by developing/showcasing IOT projects and competing in tech related competitions.
